RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STRIKING SPARKS off rail run around the first turn, dueled from the half to far turn, cleared in the stretch and all out to last on the wire. ONORE raced back to far turn, rallied in earnest, angled out coming on. REVENGE TOUR speed to the front dueled from half to quarter pole, took 3d spot. TWO MORE SHOTS tried to keep up throughout with no late kick when needed. LUCERITO BLANCO always trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Lucerito Blanco
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Revenge Tour
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front dueled from half to quarter pole, took 3d spot

ENTRY.NAME: Onore
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back to far turn, rallied in earnest, angled out coming on

ENTRY.NAME: Two More Shots
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up throughout with no late kick when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Striking Sparks
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run 1st turn dueled half to far turn, cleared, lasted

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 95. Starter Allowance Purse 14400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since June 29, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowe d 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAISON KARTER no speed, shuffled to the half, came running wide into the stretch with a late kick to clear late under stout handling. INHERENT POWERS pressed leader to the half, dueled far turn, led stretch out-gamed. KNIGHT'S CROSS showed no speed to trail, rallied on far turn, coming on too late. POPULIST between horses into first turn chasing top pair to far turn empty. MIDNIGHT NIGHTMARE sharp break from the gate to the front, stayed to far turn wilted. BLUEMOON JUSTICE saved ground throughout with no response when needed.

ENTRY.NAME: Bluemoon Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Nightmare
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp break from the gate to the front, stayed to far turn wilted

ENTRY.NAME: Inherent Powers
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed leader to the half, dueled far turn, led stretch outgamed

ENTRY.NAME: Knight's Cross
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed no speed to trail, rallied on far turn, coming on too late

ENTRY.NAME: Populist
ENTRY.OWNER: H and W Stables LLC and Odom Chris
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses into first turn chasing top pair to far turn empty

ENTRY.NAME: Raison Karter
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, shuffled to the half, came running wide to run clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 27100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since June 29, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $17,500 Or Les s Not Considered In Allowances) (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $15,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STAGE NAME just off leader to the turn, took over into the stretch ran off in impressive fashion to the wire. DERBY INCLUDED trailed to the stretch with a steady run for place, no match. BLAZING BURROUGHS raced along evenly while garnering the show spot. WHAT A RUSH speed inside to turn, gave in through stretch and faltered late. MCGRAW off rail trip but could not keep up and trailed in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Blazing Burroughs
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly while garnering the show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Derby Included
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the stretch with a steady run for place, no match

ENTRY.NAME: What a Rush
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside to turn, gave in through stretch and faltered late

ENTRY.NAME: McGraw
ENTRY.OWNER: Borchetta Mike Borchetta Martha and Borchetta Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail trip but could not keep up and trailed in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Stage Name
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leader to the turn, took over into the stretch ran off

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & WinStarFarm, LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BRYLEE inside run to the turn, angled off rail to clear late and all out to last at the wire. Q BOND shuffled back to turn, closed in the stretch run with a late run for place spot. MAGGIE E chased pace to the turn while evenly in the stretch run no gain. MY TALLULAH unhurried while trailing to the turn, came on widest run to close the gap. AADYA quick rail speed to the front, led past quarter pole but gave in. MAMBA OUT off rail close up to turn, continued outside while fading back.

ENTRY.NAME: Aadya
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick rail speed to the front, led past quarter pole but gave in

ENTRY.NAME: Brylee
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to the turn, angled off rail to clear late, lasted

ENTRY.NAME: Maggie E
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to the turn while evenly in the stretch run no gain

ENTRY.NAME: My Tallulah
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried while trailing to the turn, widest run to close gap

ENTRY.NAME: Q Bond
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back to turn, closed in the stretch run with a late run

ENTRY.NAME: Mamba Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail close up to turn, continued outside while fading back

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to t he Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RECOGNIZE ME off rail first turn while never far back, rallied far turn while well handled into the stretch run and cleared off in good order to the wire. ARTEMUS SWEETHEART never far back to far turn with a wide late run in the stretch for the place spot while best of the rest. DARTIGA bit awkward start with a slight bobble, saved ground throughout with no late kick in the stretch run. BLOSSOM DIVA sent to the front, led to the half with nothing left from the far turn.to the wire TOTAL SMOKESHOW chased leader from between horses to the half with nothing left and faded. GAMBI four wide run into first turn and never menaced and dropped far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Dartiga
ENTRY.COMMENT: slight bobble from gate, saved ground throughout with no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Blossom Diva
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent to the front led to the half with nothing left from far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Total Smokeshow
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader from between horses to the half nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Recognize Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail first turn never far back, rallied far turn well handled

ENTRY.NAME: Artemus Sweetheart
ENTRY.OWNER: Borchetta Mike Borchetta Martha and Borchetta Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back to far turn with a wide run in stretch for place

ENTRY.NAME: Gambi
ENTRY.COMMENT: four wide run into first turn, never menaced and dropped far back

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VENICE BEACH tracked leader to the turn, surged past into stretch, drew off. LOCK ON never far back to the turn, ran on in the lane for place spot. TWOBIRDSONESTONE had a ground saving trip throughout for the show spot late. CAPE MARCO DRIVE off rail trip throughout while never far back outgamed for third. REVOLUTIONARY ROAD speed to the half with nothing left in the stretch run, stopped. SUGGESTED chased leaders off rail, pulled up in distress at the furlong pole and vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Twobirdsonestone
ENTRY.COMMENT: had a ground saving trip throughout for the show spot late

ENTRY.NAME: Revolutionary Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the half with nothing left in the stretch run, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Venice Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader to the turn, surged past into stretch, drew off

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Deann Baer, Greg Baer DVM & Exaggerator Syndicate

ENTRY.NAME: Lock On
ENTRY.OWNER: Haehn T R and Molumby John
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back to the turn, ran on in the lane for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Suggested
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leaders off rail, pulled up in distress vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Cape Marco Drive
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail trip throughout while never far back outgamed for third

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 17800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 29, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races Not Cons idered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BELIEVING sharp to the front, set all pace easily with two taps to wire while in full control under stout handling. DESTINY'S DARLING chased winner from inside throughout to no avail while no match late holding the place spot. LADA KALINA brief chase from off rail to the turn, shifted to rail in the stretch to get up for third spot. YOGURT good break from the gate, could not keep up while no threat. HABOBANERO raced along between foes to turn, gave way readily to the wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Destiny's Darling
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner from inside throughout to no avail, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Believing
ENTRY.OWNER: Kuntz Mark D and Dalton Ken
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp to the front, set all pace easily with two taps to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Lada Kalina
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief chase from off rail to turn, shifted to rail, up for third

ENTRY.NAME: Habobanero
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along between foes to turn, gave way readily to the wire

ENTRY.NAME: Yogurt
ENTRY.COMMENT: good break from the gate, could not keep up while no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 68. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to t he Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IN A PEACH sat off leaders to the turn, split horses into stretch, ran away from the field in the final furlong. VOGELSANG chased pace to quarter pole, drifted out into stretch, up for 2nd. UNCOMMON GRACE inside speed to quarter pole, stayed on for show spot to the wire. MACI'S GEMSTONE off rail position while racing along evenly with no gain. GRACIE'S KITTEN off rail into first turn lost position and dropped back readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Uncommon Grace
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to quarter pole, stayed on for show spot to the wire

ENTRY.NAME: In a Peach
ENTRY.COMMENT: sat off leaders to the turn, split horses into stretch, ran away

ENTRY.NAME: Vogelsang
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to quarter pole, drifted out into stretch, up for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Maci's Gemstone
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Tommy C and Heyer Robert
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail position while racing along evenly with no gain

ENTRY.NAME: Gracie's Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail into first turn lost position and dropped back readily
